Run CmdStan's stansummary and diagnose

Source: R/fit.R
fit-method-cmdstan_summary.Rd

Run CmdStan's stansummary and diagnose utilities. These are documented in the CmdStan Guide:

  • https://mc-stan.org/docs/cmdstan-guide/stansummary.html

  • https://mc-stan.org/docs/cmdstan-guide/diagnose.html

Note

Although these methods also work for models fit using the $variational() method, much of the output is only relevant for models fit using the $sample() method.

Usage

$cmdstan_summary()
$cmdstan_diagnose()

See also

CmdStanMCMC, CmdStanMLE, CmdStanVB

Examples

# \dontrun{
fit <- cmdstanr_example("logistic")
#> Compiling Stan program...
fit$cmdstan_diagnose()
#> Running bin/diagnose \
#>   /var/folders/h6/14xy_35x4wd2tz542dn0qhtc0000gn/T/RtmpAcsuBs/logistic-202008031245-1-d8196b.csv \
#>   /var/folders/h6/14xy_35x4wd2tz542dn0qhtc0000gn/T/RtmpAcsuBs/logistic-202008031245-2-d8196b.csv \
#>   /var/folders/h6/14xy_35x4wd2tz542dn0qhtc0000gn/T/RtmpAcsuBs/logistic-202008031245-3-d8196b.csv \
#>   /var/folders/h6/14xy_35x4wd2tz542dn0qhtc0000gn/T/RtmpAcsuBs/logistic-202008031245-4-d8196b.csv
#> Processing csv files: /var/folders/h6/14xy_35x4wd2tz542dn0qhtc0000gn/T/RtmpAcsuBs/logistic-202008031245-1-d8196b.csv, /var/folders/h6/14xy_35x4wd2tz542dn0qhtc0000gn/T/RtmpAcsuBs/logistic-202008031245-2-d8196b.csv, /var/folders/h6/14xy_35x4wd2tz542dn0qhtc0000gn/T/RtmpAcsuBs/logistic-202008031245-3-d8196b.csv, /var/folders/h6/14xy_35x4wd2tz542dn0qhtc0000gn/T/RtmpAcsuBs/logistic-202008031245-4-d8196b.csv
#>

#> Treedepth satisfactory for all transitions.

fit$cmdstan_summary()
